name: Galvantula
description: The EleSpider Pokémon. They employ an electrically charged web to trap their prey. While it is immobilized by shock, they leisurely consume it.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.description: This Pokémon gets an additional +1 to attack rolls.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Opponents in combat with this Pokémon cannot eat held berries.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.
